mapper.sql: SCORE_ID, USER_NUM, USER_NAME, SCORE_NUM, CLASS_NAME, SCORE_CLASS_NAME, SCORE_AVG_NUM, SCORE_AVG_CREDIT, SCORE_TOTAL_NUM, SCORE_GPA, SCORE_TEAM, SCORE_TIME, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from stu_score
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_score (SCORE_ID, USER_NUM, USER_NAME, SCORE_NUM, CLASS_NAME, SCORE_CLASS_NAME, SCORE_AVG_NUM, SCORE_AVG_CREDIT, SCORE_TOTAL_NUM, SCORE_GPA, SCORE_TEAM, SCORE_TIME, CREATE_TIME) values (#{scoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreAvgNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreAvgCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreTotalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreGpa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scoreTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update stu_score
SCORE_ID = #{record.scoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NUM = #{record.userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_NUM = #{record.scoreNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_NAME = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_CLASS_NAME = #{record.scoreClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_AVG_NUM = #{record.scoreAvgNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_AVG_CREDIT = #{record.scoreAvgCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_TOTAL_NUM = #{record.scoreTotalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_GPA = #{record.scoreGpa,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_TEAM = #{record.scoreTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCORE_TIME = #{record.scoreTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update stu_score set SCORE_ID = #{record.scoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NUM = #{record.userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_NUM = #{record.scoreNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_NAME = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_CLASS_NAME = #{record.scoreClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_AVG_NUM = #{record.scoreAvgNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_AVG_CREDIT = #{record.scoreAvgCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_TOTAL_NUM = #{record.scoreTotalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_GPA = #{record.scoreGpa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_TEAM = #{record.scoreTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SCORE_TIME = #{record.scoreTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update stu_score
USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_NUM = #{scoreNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_CLASS_NAME = #{scoreClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_AVG_NUM = #{scoreAvgNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_AVG_CREDIT = #{scoreAvgCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_TOTAL_NUM = #{scoreTotalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_GPA = #{scoreGpa,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCORE_TEAM = #{scoreTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCORE_TIME = #{scoreTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SCORE_ID = #{scoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update stu_score set USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_NUM = #{scoreNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_CLASS_NAME = #{scoreClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE_AVG_NUM = #{scoreAvgNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_AVG_CREDIT = #{scoreAvgCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_TOTAL_NUM = #{scoreTotalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_GPA = #{scoreGpa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE_TEAM = #{scoreTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SCORE_TIME = #{scoreTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SCORE_ID = #{scoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
